title: Medical Communication Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Virtual Patient Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and patient counseling experience
context.additional_context: Virtual patient simulation education conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Targets mid-level medical professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply standardized communication protocols (e.g., SBAR) with over 80% accuracy in a virtual patient simulation environment.
Learners successfully identify key symptoms and set diagnostic priorities in interactions with virtual patients at least twice out of three attempts.
Learners can distinguish and explain at least four appropriate response strategies for different types of patient reactions through a selection interface-based simulation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
